title: 352 - 9 Prompts to Help You Make Your Most Powerful Work to Date
description:
__________

Listen and Subscribe on Apple, Spotify and more: https://link.chtbl.com/creativepeptalk
Transcripts available at https://creativepeptalk.com/episodes
__________

SHOW NOTES

Creative Zero-To-Hero Series
1. Skill
2. Story
3. Style
4. Setting
5. Psychology
6. Say Something

Hanif Abdurraqib’s “A Little Devil in America: In Praise of Black Performance” Book
http://www.abdurraqib.com/book

Rian Johnson on Creative Processing with Joseph Gordon-Levitt
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/originality-imitation-rian-johnson-filmmaker

Sarah Millican on Mike Birbiglia’s Working It Out
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/63-sarah-millican-put-the-email-address-in-last

Phil Hanson’s “Embrace the Shake” TED Talk
https://ed.ted.com/lessons/embrace-the-shake-phil-hansen

Ashley C. Ford’s “Creative Personal Writing Write the Real You” Skillshare Class
https://www.skillshare.com/classes/Creative-Personal-Writing-Write-the-Real-You

MAID on Netflix
https://www.netflix.com/search?q=maid

Brian McDonald’s “Invisible Ink” Book and “You Are a Storyteller” Podcast
https://writeinvisibleink.com/

Disney + Pixar’s “Soul” Movie
https://www.disneyplus.com/movies/soul

Pixar 'Soul' Creators Pete Docter & Kemp Powers on NPR’s Fresh Air Podcast
https://www.npr.org/pixar-soul-creators-pete-docter-kemp-powers

__________

SPONSORS
STORYBLOCKS
Video is one of my most effective ways to stand out as a creator online these days - and with Storyblocks you can take your videos to the next level - with Affordable Subscriptions, Unlimited Downloads, and 1M+ Royalty Free Assets - you can level up your content at storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk

SKILLSHARE
There’s nothing better than getting better. Accomplishing growth is extremely satisfying, and online classes from Skillshare make it possible. Learn about illustration, design, photography, productivity, and marketing. With Skillshare’s short classes, you can move your creative journey forward without putting life on hold. So explore your creativity at Skillshare.com/CreativePep where our listeners get a free trial of Premium Membership.
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Co-Loop Podcast Network)

itunes:title: 352 - 9 Prompts to Help You Make Your Most Powerful Work to Date
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
It’s so easy to get carried away focusing so much on your work, that you neglect yourSELF! BUT the quality and depth of your work comes directly from YOU, so it’s a dangerous habit to get into!

In this episode, we dive into 9 powerful creative prompts that will help you connect and deepen your sense of self, and therefore deepen your ability to express yourself.
itunes:subtitle:

itunes:keywords: personal history, creative pep talk, memoir, story prompts, prompts, story building, creative practice, narrative, memory, andy j pizza, career, creative, storytelling, writing prompt, creative writing, story
